title: Climate activists storm Amsterdam airport and block private jets
description:
Sitdown protests are part of a day of demonstrations in and around Schiphol airport

More than 100 climate activists have stormed Amsterdamâ€™s Schiphol airport and sat in front of the wheels of aircraft to prevent them from leaving.

The protesters, wearing white suits, entered an area where private jets are kept on Saturday as part of a day of demonstrations in and around the airport organised by environmental groups.
